name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Calliope Mori's First 3D Birthday Concert! #calli3DBD [hrcZEjdrkRg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope introduces her birthday merchandise items, including a sweater, wine glass, and album vinyl.
MC section where Calliope thanks the fans and introduces her final song of the concert, reflecting on her future goals.
Performance of the song 'Scuffed Up Age'.

subtitles.original: It's the alter version of Calli from the 'UnAlive' MV...
subtitles.english: It's the alter version of Calli from the 'UnAlive' MV...

subtitles.original: ...and it is super amazing. It's the same size as the Your Mori one, so it's super big.
subtitles.english: ...and it is super amazing. It's the same size as the Your Mori one, so it's super big.

subtitles.original: And it's gonna look beautiful on your wall, so I hope you guys will get it.
subtitles.english: And it's gonna look beautiful on your wall, so I hope you guys will get it.

subtitles.original: I'm looking forward to getting a bunch of them and just putting them all over my house.
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to getting a bunch of them and just putting them all over my house.

subtitles.original: Then we also have the UnAlive album vinyl. Right now it looks like it's just front and back...
subtitles.english: Then we also have the UnAlive album vinyl. Right now it looks like it's just front and back...

subtitles.original: ...but it's actually a six-panel vinyl album. So you fold it out...
subtitles.english: ...but it's actually a six-panel vinyl album. So you fold it out...

subtitles.original: ...and you get to see all of Rei's beautiful artwork in beautiful six-panel glory.
subtitles.english: ...and you get to see all of Rei's beautiful artwork in beautiful six-panel glory.

subtitles.original: So it's in the same format as the Your Mori album.
subtitles.english: So it's in the same format as the Your Mori album.

subtitles.original: Everything can be bought individually this time. And uh, yeah.
subtitles.english: Everything can be bought individually this time. And uh, yeah.

subtitles.original: If you buy everything together, you get a special printed letter from me with some choice words from your boy and also a signature.
subtitles.english: If you buy everything together, you get a special printed letter from me with some choice words from your boy and also a signature.

subtitles.original: So yeah, here's the sweater. Check it out, front and back.
subtitles.english: So yeah, here's the sweater. Check it out, front and back.

subtitles.original: On the back, you got my little Calliope Mori logo crest at the top.
subtitles.english: On the back, you got my little Calliope Mori logo crest at the top.

subtitles.original: I designed this skull myself, looking to the side over there.
subtitles.english: I designed this skull myself, looking to the side over there.

subtitles.original: It's got a really cool neck. Uh, let's go next.
subtitles.english: It's got a really cool neck. Uh, let's go next.

subtitles.original: And then we've got my wine glass. This is really cool. I can't wait to drink wine out of this.
subtitles.english: And then we've got my wine glass. This is really cool. I can't wait to drink wine out of this.

subtitles.original: It's got my signature on it and everything. Beautiful golden gradient at the bottom.
subtitles.english: It's got my signature on it and everything. Beautiful golden gradient at the bottom.

subtitles.original: It's really lovely. Next, we've got the poster.
subtitles.english: It's really lovely. Next, we've got the poster.

subtitles.original: Check this art out. I die every time I look at it. Rei's work is just like a beautiful, beautiful painting.
subtitles.english: Check this art out. I die every time I look at it. Rei's work is just like a beautiful, beautiful painting.

subtitles.original: So I hope that you guys will enjoy having this on your wall. And next, uh... is there a next?
subtitles.english: So I hope that you guys will enjoy having this on your wall. And next, uh... is there a next?

subtitles.original: The album, that's right. We've got the vinyl and it includes every single track from the album.
subtitles.english: The album, that's right. We've got the vinyl and it includes every single track from the album.

subtitles.original: Check it. Um, but like I said, it's a six-panel, so you'll open it up and there'll be more than just a front and back.
subtitles.english: Check it. Um, but like I said, it's a six-panel, so you'll open it up and there'll be more than just a front and back.

subtitles.original: And it's really cool. You guys are gonna love it so much. Um, so yeah.
subtitles.english: And it's really cool. You guys are gonna love it so much. Um, so yeah.

subtitles.original: That's all in terms of merchandise. Please look forward to a special letter from me.
subtitles.english: That's all in terms of merchandise. Please look forward to a special letter from me.

subtitles.original: It'll be a printed letter from your boy to the Dead Beats who get the full set.
subtitles.english: It'll be a printed letter from your boy to the Dead Beats who get the full set.

subtitles.original: And so yeah, look forward to that please.
subtitles.english: And so yeah, look forward to that please.

subtitles.original: 楽しみにしてくださいね。
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: Please look forward to it. Um, and yeah...
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it. Um, and yeah...

subtitles.original: I hope you guys enjoyed my birthday party, but I do have one more song.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys enjoyed my birthday party, but I do have one more song.

subtitles.original: One more song to sing to you guys. A song that's very close to my heart, about the world that we live in.
subtitles.english: One more song to sing to you guys. A song that's very close to my heart, about the world that we live in.

subtitles.original: Because from now on, I'm gonna be trying my best with Universal and really, really...
subtitles.english: Because from now on, I'm gonna be trying my best with Universal and really, really...

subtitles.original: ...頑張る from here on out.
subtitles.english: ...try my best from here on out.

subtitles.original: There's a world I want to see, and um, and it's really beautiful.
subtitles.english: There's a world I want to see, and um, and it's really beautiful.

subtitles.original: But things right now seem kind of dark and dreary, you know?
subtitles.english: But things right now seem kind of dark and dreary, you know?

subtitles.original: It really seems some days like just the worst days are every day, right?
subtitles.english: It really seems some days like just the worst days are every day, right?

subtitles.original: So um, I would like to continue forward singing songs that have some kind of meaning to me.
subtitles.english: So um, I would like to continue forward singing songs that have some kind of meaning to me.

subtitles.original: Whether they be about enjoying yourself and just having fun, wacky and wild fun party songs, or songs about our world.
subtitles.english: Whether they be about enjoying yourself and just having fun, wacky and wild fun party songs, or songs about our world.

subtitles.original: This song happens to be one of those more emotional ones.
subtitles.english: This song happens to be one of those more emotional ones.

subtitles.original: But let's keep moving forward towards the world that we want to see.
subtitles.english: But let's keep moving forward towards the world that we want to see.

subtitles.original: Let's go. Scuffed Up Age.
subtitles.english: Let's go. Scuffed Up Age.

subtitles.original:
Scuffed Up Age
Lyrics: Mori Calliope, Camellia / Composition: Camellia
subtitles.english:
Scuffed Up Age
Lyrics: Mori Calliope, Camellia / Composition: Camellia

subtitles.original: Lost in thoughts, a frost-tipped fray of mind
subtitles.english: Lost in thoughts, a frost-tipped fray of mind

subtitles.original: Honest to God, it's just not our time
subtitles.english: Honest to God, it's just not our time

subtitles.original: Promises flawed by cosmic design
subtitles.english: Promises flawed by cosmic design

subtitles.original: これくらい取ってことない、でも涙のあとは消さない
subtitles.english: It’s nothing much, but I won’t erase the traces of tears

subtitles.original: Coming of age, the stage doesn't light up
subtitles.english: Coming of age, the stage doesn't light up

subtitles.original: Just right away, they told us it might've
subtitles.english: Just right away, they told us it might've

subtitles.original: 夢はもう諦めました
subtitles.english: I’ve already given up on dreams

subtitles.original: Cynical mindset, why’d you try? Why not give up and play the bad guy?
subtitles.english: Cynical mindset, why’d you try? Why not give up and play the bad guy?

subtitles.original: 分かってるさ
subtitles.english: I know it

subtitles.original: 胸が涙で濡れながら
subtitles.english: While my chest gets wet with tears

subtitles.original: あなたの元へ急ぐのなら
subtitles.english: If I hurry to where you are

subtitles.original: 崩れ落ちそうな体、抱きしめながら
subtitles.english: While hugging my body that seems about to collapse

subtitles.original: We choose to know
subtitles.english: We choose to know

subtitles.original: The struggles of this scuffed up age we’re living in
subtitles.english: The struggles of this scuffed up age we’re living in

subtitles.original: だからもう
subtitles.english: So already

subtitles.original: 火蓋を切ってこう
subtitles.english: Let’s start the fire

subtitles.original: この夜は結構似合ってる、あなたのドレス
subtitles.english: This night suits your dress quite well

subtitles.original: それでも
subtitles.english: Even so

subtitles.original: あなたは絶対に離さないで、ねえ
subtitles.english: You, please never let go, okay?

subtitles.original: Can't find a reason to stay, some botched world led astray
subtitles.english: Can't find a reason to stay, some botched world led astray

subtitles.original: Once trusted left to decay
subtitles.english: Once trusted left to decay

subtitles.original: We choose to go on anyway
subtitles.english: We choose to go on anyway

subtitles.original: Lost in thoughts of all with change in pace
subtitles.english: Lost in thoughts of all with change in pace

subtitles.original: Allies and friends hide in more than one face
subtitles.english: Allies and friends hide in more than one face

subtitles.original: Not really surprising, why are you compromising?
subtitles.english: Not really surprising, why are you compromising?
